gameDetails.name: Ashes Reborn: The Queen of Lightning
gameDetails.description:
Dimona Odinstar uses divine and time magic to lead her army of knights into battle, moving with the speed and ruthlessness of lightning itself!

Mount units return! Take to the skies with Dimona's signature Empyrean Mount.

Use this prebuilt deck to take down your opponents, or combine Dimona's cards with your favorite Ashes spells and allies to customize a new deck.
